    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Napitek nevidnosti</string>
            <string language="en">Elixir of invisibility</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elixier der Unsichtbarkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Élixir d'invisibilité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Elixir do invisibility</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Elisir di invisibility</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελιξίριο της αορατότητας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Elixir de la invisibilidad</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Učenec lahko nalogo rešuje kar z računalnikom. Najprej shranite dokument na svoj računalnik, nato lahko ustvarja in popravlja po mili volji. Učni list pa lahko seveda tudi natisnete, vendar doadajte črte za ročno pisanje.</string>
            <string language="en">Writing essay on events that can occur when drinking elixir of invisibility.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">napitek</string>
            <string language="en">elixir</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">nevidnost</string>
            <string language="en">invisibility</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">domišljija</string>
            <string language="en">imagination</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">spis</string>
            <string language="en">essay</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben Versuch auf Fällen, die auftreten 
können, wenn sie Elixier der Unsichtbarkeit trinken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Essai d'écriture sur les événements qui 
peuvent se produire en buvant de l'élixir de l'invisibilité.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Essay da escrita nos eventos que podem ocorrer ao
beber o elixir do invisibility.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Saggio di scrittura sugli eventi che possono 
accadere quando beve l'elisir di invisibility.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δοκίμιο γραψίματος στα γεγονότα που μπορούν να 
εμφανιστούν κατά το κατανάλωση του ελιξιρίου της αορατότητας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ensayo de la escritura en los acontecimientos que
pueden ocurrir al beber el elixir de la invisibilidad.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elixier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unsichtbarkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
